Detailed Description

Main window for the image browser application. It provides a menu for calling different operations on the images stored like renaming, deleting, or loading.

BOOLEAN ImageBrowserWin::SetImageFilter (  const ImageFilter &  img_filter,
BOOLEAN  show_select_button
) 
 

Sets the ImageFilter and reloads the entries of the ImageRefContainer by applying the image filter to every image.

Parameters:
img_filter ImageFilter to apply.
show_select_button Defines if the select_button should be shown after the image_filter has been applied to the entries.
